reviewText: Great documentary about rural life in Michigan. It's a great gift for anybody who enjoys high school basketball and ice fishing.

My husband and I stumbled across "Nimrod Nation" when it was being aired on Sundance.  My husband is a "yooper" so we are quite familiar with the "U.P." and watching this show was like going home for us.  It is very family friendly, engaging,  and fun to watch.  Go Nimrods!
